name: UpdateGithubDiscussionComment
description:
Updates a GitHub discussion comment's text.

This tool edits the body text of a discussion comment in a GitHub organization team. Use it when you need to update the content of a comment in a team discussion. Requires OAuth access tokens with `write:discussion` scope.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub organization. It is not case-sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the team name. This is used to specify the team in the organization.

value_schema.description: The slug of the team name.

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The unique number identifying the GitHub discussion to update the comment in.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the discussion.

parameters.name: comment_identifier
parameters.description: A unique integer identifying the comment to be updated in the discussion.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the comment.

parameters.name: discussion_comment_body
parameters.description: The new text for the discussion comment to be updated.
